Disclaimer: This file contains all texts available in VPFlow, any translations are welcome in separate files - no need to translate this line, you can also remove the commented-out section starting with // after a translation

Translation.Support_Text: If you enjoy my work, please consider showing your support by following or donating! Your contribution can make a significant difference.
Translation.About_Tip1DoubleClickPresetText: Double Click on a Preset to quickly Apply it
Translation.About_Tip2LockAxisText: Lock the X or Y axis by holding Shift or Control
Translation.About_Tip3ManualCoordinatesText: Set values manually by clicking on coordinates
Translation.About_UsingLatestVersionText: You are using the latest version
Translation.YesNo_MultipleEventsText: Multiple Events were selected. Continue with the first one?
Translation.YesNo_MultipleTracksText: Multiple Tracks were selected. Continue with the first one?
Translation.YesNo_TrackMotionWarningText:
Applying to Track Motion with the Window open could take minutes to finish.
Please make sure you close it before moving on.
Translation.YesNo_LongAnimatedSectionText:
The selected section might take a bit longer to calculate. Continue?

Selected Parameter was not found.
